column4: hello all, can anyone help me? i have a continuos errors when i update to ubuntu 12.04 from 10.04, Ubuntu-classic with effects dont start and some apps crashes.. :S
i only can loggin at gnome-classic without effects
but without effects run too slowly
im writing at gedit and in few min crashes
perhaps the upgrade process got interrupted somehow .. and your graphic card should be activated for those 3d effects.
switch to a real console by pressing Ctrl+Alt+F1 .. then login with your user name and password . execute the commands sudo apt-get update
you can always go back to the X session with Ctrl+Alt+F7 ..
i have two possible drivers for my nvidia card, 1. current version (recommend) or 2. update post-release (version current-updates)
Right , sudo apt-get autoclean , sudo apt-get clean sudo apt-get autoremove , sudo dpkg -reconfigure -a , sudo apt-get --fix-missing install
sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
